resources.string: Redstone Guides. A similar app to this but with a redstone guides. There are doors, farms, traps and more.
Very simple wooden house with a roof corner and a small courtyard.
Difficult, but a very large house. It has two residential floors and a loft. I specifically did not do inside the walls. You can rasplonirovat rooms as you like.
The central area of the city with shops, blacksmiths and a fountain. :)
The main building of the city. Here you can place useful information for residents and more. Construction difficult enough, try not to get confused. :)
Each city needs protection. This is a high wall with gates and towers. Very simple construction.
Wooden Beach. In the future it will be built on the entire harbor. :)
There are built ships. Large building construction and mechanism for launching the ship into the water.
Here are all the ships coming into the harbor and preparing to sail.
It stores all the resources passing through the harbor.
Large mechanism for the transfer of cargo from ship to shore and vice versa.
Stone Beach. In the future it will be built on the entire harbor. :)
There are built ships. Large building construction and mechanism for launching the ship into the water.
Here are all the ships coming into the harbor and preparing to sail.
It stores all the resources passing through the harbor.
Large mechanism for the transfer of cargo from ship to shore and vice versa.
This is the entrance to the dungeon. There must be a troll.
Tunnels in your dungeon. Put plenty of different traps. :)
In these areas you can place your house or hide treasures.
This is the entrance to the dungeon. There must be a troll.
Tunnels in your dungeon. Put plenty of different traps. :)
In these areas you can place your house or hide treasures.
A simple house made of stone bricks.
Serves as a central building in the city.
Large house, which can live for several players.
A complete analysis of the mechanism can be found in our app \"Redstone schemes\".
Market Square with a fountain, shops and night lighting.
It is used for cattle and as a warehouse.
Be careful. Fire can spread to the roof and surrounding wall. Replace them with non-combustible materials.
This structure will help you in the early stages of the game (destroy it later, please ^_^).
Before construction recommend that you read the same guide on our app \"Minecraft Redstone Guide\".
